vote.title: Authorize the first amendment to the development agreement between the City of Dallas and Burchfield & Partners, LLC to extend the deadline to March 31, 2024 for completing the development project and to increase the City’s reimbursement amount for the development of certain airport-owned common-use improvements at Dallas Executive Airport - Not to exceed $600,000.00 - Financing: Aviation Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize the first amendment to the development agreement between the City of Dallas and Burchfield & Partners, LLC to extend the deadline to March 31, 2024 for completing the development project and to increase the City’s reimbursement amount for the development of certain airport-owned common-use improvements at Dallas Executive Airport - Not to exceed $600,000.00 - Financing: Aviation Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
